action_modal.details: For bookings made on or after April 6, 2020, be sure to consider the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) and associated government measures. If you don’t book a flexible rate, you may not be entitled to a refund. Your cancellation request will be handled by the property, based on your chosen policy and consumer law where applicable. During times of uncertainty, we recommend booking an option with free cancellation. If your plans change, you can cancel free of charge until free cancellation expires.
action_modal.title: Check your booking conditions

banner.subtitle: We recommend booking an option with free cancellation in case your travel plans change.
banner.title: As of April 6, 2020, your chosen cancellation policy will apply, regardless of the coronavirus.

hotel_name: Fusion Resort Phu Quoc - All Spa Inclusive

hotel_text.important_information:
Guests who wish to utlise the complimentary roundtrip airport shuttle service with fixed schedule (approximately 45 minutes each way) are advised to inform the property your flight number and expect arrival time at least 48 hours prior to arrival date.

Please note that the Zen Rooftop is closed until further notice.

Guests are required to show a photo ID and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply. Please inform Fusion Resort Phu Quoc - All Spa Inclusive of your expected arrival time in advance. You can use the Special Requests box when booking, or contact the property directly using the contact details in your confirmation.

policies.content: You can cancel free of charge until 30 days before arrival. You'll be charged the total price of the reservation if you cancel in the 30 days before arrival.

All children are welcome. 4 children under 12 years stay free of charge when using existing beds.
4 children from 12 to 16 year are charged  VND 1500000 per night when using existing beds.
Up to three children under 3 years stay free of charge in a crib.
Up to three children under 16 years are charged  VND 1200000 per night for extra beds.
Up to three older children or adults are charged  VND 1750000 per night for extra beds.
The maximum number of extra beds in a room is 3.
The maximum number of total guests in a room is 18.
The maximum number of cribs in a room is 3.
Any type of extra bed or crib is upon request and needs to be confirmed by management.
Additional fees are not calculated automatically in the total cost and will have to be paid for separately during your stay.
WiFi is available in all areas and is free of charge.
Free private parking is available  on site (reservation is not needed).
You'll be charged a prepayment of the total price of the reservation in the 30 days before arrival.
The property reserves the right to pre-authorize credit cards prior to arrival.
10 % VAT is included. 5 % Service charge is included. A City tax is not applicable.
items: A City tax is not applicable.

messages: Check for travel restrictions. Travel might only be permitted for certain purposes, and touristic travel in particular may not be allowed.
info_banners.title: Coronavirus (COVID-19) support
